meanings.sent1: The dog found a sizable bone in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: She received a sizable package in the mail.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so sizable that it could feed the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His collection of stamps was as sizable as a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The tree cast a sizable shadow over the garden.

meanings.sent1: There was a sizable crowd at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The company made a sizable profit this quarter.
meanings.sent3: The joke caused a sizable laughter among the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her influence in the community was as sizable as a giant's.
meanings.sent5: The storm left a sizable mess in its wake.
